content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

--Query calendar file
SELECT 
    *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
) AS [result]

--check the datatype
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
    *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK ''calendar.csv'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '',''
) AS [result]'

--Find the maximum length per column
SELECT 
    MAX(LEN(date_key)),MAX(LEN(date)),MAX(LEN(year)),MAX(LEN(month)),MAX(LEN(day)),MAX(LEN(day_name)),MAX(LEN(day_of_year)),MAX(LEN(week_of_month)),MAX(LEN(week_of_year)),MAX(LEN(month_name)),MAX(LEN(year_month)),MAX(LEN(year_week))
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
) AS [result]

--date_key SMALLINT 1, date DATE 2, year SMALLINT 3, month SMALLINT 4, day SMALLINT 5, day_name VARCHAR(15) 6, day_of_year SMALLINT 7,
--week_of_month SMALLINT 8, week_of_year SMALLINT 9, month_name VARCHAR(15) 10, year_month SMALLINT 11, year_week SMALLINT 12

SELECT 
    *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
) WITH (
    date_key INT 1, 
    date DATE 2, 
    year SMALLINT 3, 
    month SMALLINT 4, 
    day SMALLINT 5, 
    day_name VARCHAR(15) 6, 
    day_of_year SMALLINT 7,
    week_of_month SMALLINT 8, 
    week_of_year SMALLINT 9, 
    month_name VARCHAR(15) 10, 
    year_month INT 11, 
    year_week INT 12
)AS [result]
